payload.query: Build comprehensive Inventory domain capabilities. Inventory Master responsibilities: asset tracking, dependency management, license compliance, version control. Deploy specialized inventory workers: 1) Asset Discovery Worker (scan infrastructure, identify assets, update inventory database), 2) Dependency Mapping Worker (build dependency graphs, identify relationships, detect circular dependencies), 3) License Management Worker (track software licenses, compliance monitoring, expiration alerts), 4) Version Control Worker (track software versions, identify outdated components, update recommendations). Create comprehensive asset database. Build dependency visualization. Implement automated inventory updates.
payload.title: PHASE 2.8: Develop Inventory Master and Specialized Workers

original_input.title: PHASE 2.8: Develop Inventory Master and Specialized Workers
